projects.title: Winshu
projects.description: Produced and designed a 4 v 4 bright colorful multiplayer game that has Chinese mythological creatures based on (Chinese guardian lions, aka lion dogs aka foo dogs). These lions have elemental powers such as fire, water, wood, metal and earth.

projects.title: AI Machine Learning SaaS Platform
projects.description: Used Python's Pytorch for machine learning and building a data-driven platform

skills.title: Agile & scrum development
skills.description: I'm a developer with robust Agile experience, including proficiency in tools such as Figma, Jira, and Asana. I thrive in collaborative, fast-paced environments, leveraging Agile methodologies to swiftly adapt, fulfill client requirements, and secure project success. My Agile mindset champions flexibility, transparency, and a customer-centric approach, consistently delivering projects efficiently, on schedule, and to the satisfaction of stakeholders

skills.title: Cloud computing and serverless architecture
skills.description: I have experience deploying apps on AWS, Digital Ocean, Microsoft Azure and Google's GCP.

skills.title: Coding tools
skills.description: Expert in Git and Github can do code reviews, fork repos and work in large teams to improve and streamline existing code.

skills.title: A.I. & Data analytics
skills.description: I have a strong foundation in A.I. and Machine Learning, leveraging top libraries such as PyTorch and TensorFlow for deep learning projects. In addition, I excel in Data Analytics, using industry-leading tools like KNIME and Tableau to extract actionable insights from complex datasets, driving informed decision-making for your business.

aboutpara: I am a versatile Full Stack Engineer and my tech stack includes the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) stack with GraphQL and Typescript. For machine learning and AI I use Python/Django. With a passion for crafting efficient and user-friendly web applications. My commitment to clean code, problem-solving, and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends makes me a valuable asset to any development team. Let's collaborate to build innovative solutions that drive results. I am bilingual in English and Mandarin Chinese. Additionally, I have a passion for playing and watching ice hockey!

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer, and maker.
resume.description: In the tech industry, I've honed my skills by developing and deploying websites and applications built with React and Javascript/TypeScript. Familiar with the full spectrum of application development, I'm well-acquainted with the responsibility of crafting bug-free applications and consistently producing tangible results. As a versatile professional, I've played pivotal roles in agile teams, both as a Product Manager and as a Full Stack Engineer. Proficient in agile and scrum methodologies, I've successfully led cross-functional teams to drive project outcomes. My dedication to ongoing education and adaptability ensures I stay at the forefront of emerging technologies, providing a unique blend of technical expertise and leadership to all endeavors.
